root.Summary: Nothing happens after click on button Enter in login form
root.Description: Nothing happens after clicking on the Login button in the login form with validly filled fields
root.Precondition: The user is registered on the site
root.Step_to_repoduce: 1) Open login form by link https://site/authorization.com 2) Validly fill in the name and password fields 3) Click on button Enter 4) Check that nothing is happening
